headline: How Recent Analyst Shifts Are Changing the Story for Southwest Airlines
summary: Southwest Airlines' stock narrative has seen a subtle, positive shift as the consensus analyst price target inched up from $34.07 to $34.23. This adjustment reflects growing optimism among analysts following incremental improvements in the company's revenue outlook and broader industry trends. Stay tuned to discover how you can continue tracking these evolving perspectives and keep up with future updates on Southwest's story. Stay updated as the Fair Value for Southwest Airlines shifts by...
